name: Moon Knight

abilities.name: Grappling Hook / Cable
abilities.details: Uses a cable gun for grappling or potentially pulling enemies.

abilities.name: Khonshu's Blessing (Stance?)
abilities.details: Briefly empowers next ability or gains temporary buff (e.g., damage reduction, speed).

ultimate.name: Fist of Khonshu
ultimate.effect: Becomes empowered for 8s: Increased damage, damage resistance, and faster ability cooldowns.
ultimate.details: Channels the vengeful power of the Egyptian moon god.

passives.name: Embrace the Pain
passives.details: Gains increased damage resistance the lower his health is.

lore: Marc Spector, a mercenary left for dead, was resurrected by the Egyptian moon god Khonshu to serve as his avatar. Suffering from dissociative identity disorder, Moon Knight operates under multiple personas, fighting crime with brutal methods.
